snippet.title: Directive 8020 | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
In space, death takes many forms.

Hunted by an alien organism capable of mimicking its prey, the crew of the Cassiopeia must outwit their pursuers to make it home alive. To help them survive, the choices you make are more important than ever! Evade real-time threats where any step could be your last. Decide who to trust in a world where anyone could be a deadly alien imposter. 

From the developers of Until Dawn and The Quarry, an all-new sci-fi survival horror adventure. Featuring Hollywood actress, Lashana Lynch (Bob Marley: One Love, The Woman King) as the ground-breaking astronaut, 'Young', Directive 8020 is an immersive cinematic horror experience that blends intense survival gameplay with a branching narrative storyline.

COMING 2025

WISHLIST NOW
PS5: https://bit.ly/Directive8020-Playstation
Xbox X|S: https://bit.ly/Directive8020-Xbox
Steam: https://bit.ly/Directive8020-Steam
